Hello! I'm Toyosi Akinoso...

A Front End developer and User Interface designer, passionate about design and bringing awesome interfaces and experiences to life.

I am experienced at implementing pixel-perfect interfaces using HTML, CSS and javascript(inclusive of frameworks like React and Vue).

Some of the tools I use include Gulp and Webpack to improve build process and Figma for design and wireframing. Atom for code, GIT for version control, Slack for collaboration, Trello for task management and my Headphones for noise control :P.

What I do

Front End Development, User Interface Design

Skillset

HTML, CSS, JS, Design Thinking

Favorite Tools

Atom, GIT, Figma, Zeplin, Slack, Trello
